alert.note: Alert for South Central Mountains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 22 at 6:02PM MST until February 23 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST WEDNESDAY... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM TO 7 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, south winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. For the Wind Advisory, southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * WHERE...South Central Mountains. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, from 9 AM to 7 PM MST Wednesday. For the Wind Advisory, until 5 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Take action to secure trash cans, lawn furniture, and other loose or lightweight outdoor objects. Extremely hazardous driving conditions can be expected, especially for motorists in high profile vehicles who should consider delaying travel.
